comment: More than hours since New Zealand announced men'sT I squad and Zimbabwe Test squad , no squad news on ICC social media platforms . Will ICC ever miss an Indian squad news ? discrimination

                  :op1 (a2 / announce-01

                                    :op1 "New"
                                    :op2 "Zealand"))
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and

                                                :op2 "T"
                                                :op3 "I")))
                              :op2 (s4 / squad
                                    :mod (c2 / country
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "Zimbabwe"))
                                    :mod (t / test))))
                  :duration (m2 / more-than

                                    :unit (h / hour)))))
            :snt2 (m4 / miss-02

                  :ARG1 (n6 / news

            :mod (d / discriminate-02)))
